values: 思考；思想；想法；意图；见解；考虑；看法；意见；主意；思维；思想活动；沉思；冥想；理念；观点；构思；念头；心思
思考；思索；琢磨；想；思想；考虑；认为；以为；料想；想起；（think的过去式和过去分词）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 思考的；思想的；有理性的；好思考的
思考；思想；想法；意见；见解
轻率的；欠考虑的；考虑不周的；不顾及他人的
能想到的；可相信的；可考虑的；可能的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指个人或一些人所持有的具体概念或念头，也可指概念的形成过程，含一定的想象和感情色彩意味。
指从众多实例中通过概括、归纳而形成的对事物本质、全貌及其内部联系的概念或看法。
最普通常用词，几乎适用于任何方面的思维活动。
指的是一种模糊的，变化的莫测的想法，无可靠的基础，未经深思熟虑的观点。
指外部刺激在思想中所产生的印象。
指以推理、思考等智力活动为基础的心理思维活动及其结果。

word_group.brief_definition: 思维方式；思维模式；思想型式

bilingual.source: I can't ber the thought of losing you.
bilingual.target: 我无法忍受失去你的想法。

bilingual.source: I can't bear the thought of losing you.
bilingual.target: 我无法忍受失去你的想法。

bilingual.source: He can't bere the thought of losing her.
bilingual.target: 他无法忍受失去她的想法。

bilingual.source: She balks at the thought of quitting her job.
bilingual.target: 她对辞职的想法感到犹豫。

bilingual.source: The thought of leaving her family saddens her.
bilingual.target: 离开家人的想法使她悲伤。

bilingual.source: He couldn't bear the thought of torturing animals.
bilingual.target: 他无法忍受折磨动物的想法。

bilingual.source: She expressed her repugnance at the thought of animal cruelty.
bilingual.target: 她对虐待动物的想法表达了厌恶。

bilingual.source: The thought of wasting food is anathema to him.
bilingual.target: 对他来说，浪费食物的想法是令人厌恶的事物。

bilingual.source: He is dismissing the idea without giving it a second thought.
bilingual.target: 他没有多想就否定了这个想法。

yingyinNormal.en: That's a lovely random thought.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你从哪冒出来这个想法的，不过说得很对。

yingyinNormal.en: Such a simple kind of thought, but that was the thinking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想法很简单，但那就是他们的想法

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we only have two months to find a venue, and I had a thought.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只剩两个月时间找场地了，而我有个想法。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, Your Honor, just one brief thought. If you'll indulge me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，法官阁下，我还有一点想法，恳请您的许可。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I've given this a lot of thought, and I think I can answer your question in three parts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对此我有很多想法，我看我可以分三个部分来回答这个问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Howard Stark fished that out of the ocean when he was looking for you. He thought what we think.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是霍华德·史塔克在搜救你的时候，从大海里找到的。和我的想法一样。

yingyinNormal.en: You ask anyone who survives a jump from the Golden Gate Bridge what their last thought is...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你去问问那些从金门大桥跳下来自杀的幸存者，他们最后的一刻的想法是什么…

yingyinNormal.en: I felt strong, in control. I told Bryce what I thought and I was determined not to talk to him for the rest of the evening.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得自己能掌控一切 我告诉布莱斯我的想法，也决心晚上不再跟他说话。

yingyinNormal.en: What if Caroline thought she might have made a mistake by breaking up with you? Would you consider being a runaway groom and giving it another shot with her? Just a thought.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是卡洛琳觉得自己犯了错误不该跟你分手，你会愿意考虑当逃跑新郎，再给你们俩感情一次机会吗？只是个想法而已。

yingyinNormal.en: But I had another thought. Who? Not Who. How. I don't think I should choose her. I think the party should choose her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我还有个想法。谁？不是"谁"，是怎样，我觉得不应该由我选她，我认为应该由党选她。

yingyinNormal.en: To create more dimension l suppose, not sure if it makes a vast difference, but I don't know, it's a thought that counts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了制造出更立体的效果，不确定这个是不是能有一个明显差别，我不知道，这只是我的想法。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, sure, it was tough, raising three kids and running a business. But when the chance to be She-E-O arose, I had only one thought.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道，这很不容易养大三个孩子还要兼顾事业。不过当我有机会成为女总裁时，我只有一个想法。

yingyinNormal.en: When I was going through all my insecurities And uncertainty and lack of confidence, I was losing focus on god. I was focusing on all these other things, Like my job and what other people thought of me And what the reporters were writing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我感到缺乏安全感，失去信心，那是因为我分散了对神的专注，我把注意力放到别的事情上了，比如我的工作和别人的想法以及各种对我的报道

yingyinNormal.en: Nope. Gates gave a speech at the university. Sheldon went up to him afterwards and said, "Maybe if you weren't so distracted by sick children in Africa, you could have put a little more thought into Windows Vista."
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的，盖茨来大学里演讲结束后，谢尔顿走过去跟他说，"如果你不是为非洲的病童那么劳神的话，或许你能有多一点想法，好好弄弄Windows Vista"。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought they chose me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以为他们选择的是我。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought you'd like it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想你会感兴趣。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought you were dead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 唔，我还以为你死了呢。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought I heard voices.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我说我听到什么声音了！

yingyinNormal.en: They thought he was crazy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 都觉得他疯了。

yingyinNormal.en: But I thought you loved her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不是很喜欢她吗？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 思考能力; 思维过程
思想; 学说; 思潮
关心; 关怀; 顾虑; 忧虑

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 想不到的；不可能的；想象不到的
adj. 沉思的；思考的；体贴的；考虑周到的；关心别人的；经缜密思考的；注意的
n. 想法；意见；见解；主意；思考；思索；思想活动；思想；思维；考虑
adj. 不为他人着想的；不顾及他人的；不考虑后果的；轻率的
adj. 有思考力的；有理性的；思想的
v. 再思考；重新考虑
v. 过度思考；过分考虑
n. 思考者；思想家

word_family.mean: v. 认为；以为；想；思索；思考；我认为；想起；明白；预计；预料

sense_info_list.en: something (as an idea or opinion) formed in the mind

examination_example.sentence: Before you share your <highlight>thoughts</highlight>, think about what the powerful person cares about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你分享你的想法之前，想想有权势的人关心什么。

examination_example.sentence: Do your best to engage coworkers in a genuine, back-and-forth conversation, rather than prioritizing your own <highlight>thoughts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽可能与同事进行一次有来有往的真诚交流，而不是优先考虑你自己的想法。

examination_example.sentence: We often feel the need to tell others how we feel, whether it's a concern about a project, a stray <highlight>thought</highlight>, or a compliment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们经常觉得有必要告诉别人我们的感受，无论是对一个项目的担忧，一个迷茫的想法，或是赞美。

examination_example.sentence: We think of it simply as a healthy and helpful flow of intelligent <highlight>thought</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们简单地认为它是一种健康而有益的智慧思维。

examination_example.sentence: You live in your skin, think your own <highlight>thoughts</highlight>, have your own values and make your own choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你生在自己的肌肤之下，思考自己的想法，拥有自己的价值观，做出自己的选择。

sense_info_list.zh: 思考能力; 思维过程

examination_example.sentence: It's not as hard for them to transform their <highlight>thought</highlight> processes as it is for older students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对他们来说，转变思维过程并不像对高年级学生那样困难。

sense_info_list.zh: 思想; 学说; 思潮

sense_info_list.en: the act of thinking seriously and carefully about something
a feeling of care or worry
sense_info_list.zh: 关心; 关怀; 顾虑; 忧虑

exam_freq_info.chinese: 思想; 学说; 思潮
关心; 关怀; 顾虑; 忧虑

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 想不到的；不可能的；想象不到的
adj. 沉思的；思考的；体贴的；考虑周到的；关心别人的；经缜密思考的；注意的
n. 想法；意见；见解；主意；思考；思索；思想活动；思想；思维；考虑
adj. 有思考力的；有理性的；思想的
v. 再思考；重新考虑
n. 思考者；思想家

word_family.mean: v. 认为；以为；想；思索；思考；我认为；想起；明白；预计；预料

sense_info_list.en: the act or process of thinking

examination_example.sentence: The plan was to reduce prices to move the stock, arguably encouraging consumers to buy and throw away with little <highlight>thought</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该计划是通过降价来转移库存，可以说是鼓励消费者不假思索地购买和丢弃。

examination_example.sentence: Getting input from others not only offers a fresh perspective and <highlight>thought</highlight> process, it often also includes riskier choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从别人那里获得投入不仅提供了一个新的视角和思考过程，它往往还包括更多的风险选择。

sense_info_list.en: something (as an idea or opinion) formed in the mind

examination_example.sentence: Copying someone's <highlight>thoughts</highlight>, ideas or inventions is completely unacceptable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 抄袭某人的思想、想法或发明是完全不可接受的。

examination_example.sentence: Many studies have found that feelings and <highlight>thoughts</highlight> don't necessarily predict behavior.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多研究发现，感觉和看法不一定能预测行为。

sense_info_list.en: the act of thinking seriously and carefully about something
a person's mind and all the ideas that they have in it when they are thinking

sense_info_list.zh: 思想; 学说; 思潮

examination_example.sentence: Reason and <highlight>thought</highlight> were most valued in this garden—all derived from the project of the Enlightenment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这座花园里，理性和思想最受重视——一切都源于启蒙运动。

sense_info_list.en: a feeling of care or worry
sense_info_list.zh: 关心; 关怀; 顾虑; 忧虑

word_usage.usage: thought作“关心，注意，考虑”解时，常与介词for连用; 作“想法，见解，观点”解时，常用复数形式; 作“意向，意图”解时，常与“of+ v -ing”结构连用。
have (some) thoughts of doing和have a thought of doing都是“考虑做某事”的意思。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 思考能力; 思维过程

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 沉思的；思考的；体贴的；考虑周到的；关心别人的；经缜密思考的；注意的
n. 想法；意见；见解；主意；思考；思索；思想活动；思想；思维；考虑
adj. 有思考力的；有理性的；思想的
v. 再思考；重新考虑
n. 思考者；思想家

word_family.mean: v. 认为；以为；想；思索；思考；我认为；想起；明白；预计；预料

sense_info_list.en: the act or process of thinking

examination_example.sentence: Two thirds of men and a quarter of women would rather self-administer electric shocks than sit alone with their <highlight>thoughts</highlight> for 15 minutes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 三分之二的男性和四分之一的女性宁愿自我电击，也不愿独自坐着思考十五分钟。

examination_example.sentence: Money therefore becomes a stressful topic, and so the <highlight>thought</highlight> of sitting down and planning is an unattractive proposition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，金钱成为一个压力很大的话题，因此坐下来计划的想法是一个没有吸引力的提议。

sense_info_list.en: something (as an idea or opinion) formed in the mind

examination_example.sentence: Such momentary <highlight>thoughts</highlight> were represented in words and passed down across generations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种瞬间的想法被用文字表达出来，代代相传。

examination_example.sentence: Each session has a theme, and participants are given a variety of materials and prompts and asked to cover surfaces with their <highlight>thoughts</highlight> and art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次活动都有一个主题，参与者利用给定的各种材料和提示在墙上表达出他们的想法和艺术作品。

examination_example.sentence: Her enthusiasm fading at the <highlight>thought</highlight> of how long that might take, just to have her kids reject it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一想到要花多长时间才能让她的孩子拒绝，她的热情就消退了。

sense_info_list.en: a person's mind and all the ideas that they have in it when they are thinking
the power or process of thinking
sense_info_list.zh: 思考能力; 思维过程

sense_info_list.en: the act of thinking seriously and carefully about something

word_usage.usage: have (some) thoughts of doing和have a thought of doing都是“考虑做某事”的意思。
thought作“关心，注意，考虑”解时，常与介词for连用; 作“想法，见解，观点”解时，常用复数形式; 作“意向，意图”解时，常与“of+ v -ing”结构连用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 想不到的；不可能的；想象不到的
adj. 沉思的；思考的；体贴的；考虑周到的；关心别人的；经缜密思考的；注意的
n. 想法；意见；见解；主意；思考；思索；思想活动；思想；思维；考虑
adj. 有思考力的；有理性的；思想的
n. 思考者；思想家

word_family.mean: v. 认为；以为；想；思索；思考；我认为；想起；明白；预计；预料

sense_info_list.en: something (as an idea or opinion) formed in the mind

examination_example.sentence: With that <highlight>thought</highlight> in mind, Pruitt came up with a plan and posted it on the community website.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到这一点，Pruitt想出了一个计划，并将其发布在社区网站上。

examination_example.sentence: My <highlight>thoughts</highlight> were soon put to the test.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的想法很快就受到了考验。

sense_info_list.en: the act or process of thinking

exam_freq_info.chinese: 思想; 学说; 思潮

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 想不到的；不可能的；想象不到的
adj. 沉思的；思考的；体贴的；考虑周到的；关心别人的；经缜密思考的；注意的
n. 想法；意见；见解；主意；思考；思索；思想活动；思想；思维；考虑
adj. 有思考力的；有理性的；思想的
v. 再思考；重新考虑
n. 思考者；思想家

word_family.mean: v. 认为；以为；想；思索；思考；我认为；想起；明白；预计；预料

sense_info_list.en: something (as an idea or opinion) formed in the mind

examination_example.sentence: Keep any negative (消极的) <highlight>thoughts</highlight> to yourself - at least until you are away from the game.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至少在你离开这场比赛之前，把任何消极的想法留给你自己。

examination_example.sentence: They were quite surprised and all reached the hall holding various <highlight>thoughts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们非常惊讶，都抱着各种想法来到大厅。

examination_example.sentence: Mr. Reynolds, my teacher, handed us a list of <highlight>thoughts</highlight>, and asked us to write a paper on one of those <highlight>thoughts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的老师雷诺兹先生递给我们一份想法清单，并要求我们就其中一个想法写一篇论文。

sense_info_list.zh: 思想; 学说; 思潮

examination_example.sentence: Confucius' <highlight>thought</highlight> is considered to have been the necessity of Eastern <highlight>thought</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孔子的思想被认为是东方思想的一个必要组成部分。

examination_example.sentence: the base of Chinese <highlight>thought</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国思想的基础

sense_info_list.en: the act of thinking seriously and carefully about something

examination_example.sentence: Monica was lost in <highlight>thought</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫妮卡陷入了沉思。

word_usage.usage: thought作“关心，注意，考虑”解时，常与介词for连用; 作“想法，见解，观点”解时，常用复数形式; 作“意向，意图”解时，常与“of+ v -ing”结构连用。
have (some) thoughts of doing和have a thought of doing都是“考虑做某事”的意思。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通常用词，几乎适用于任何方面的思维活动。
指以推理、思考等智力活动为基础的心理思维活动及其结果。
